numlitem.para: Both thrust levers are operated manually for go-around, and
Autopilot and Flight Director are not used below 500 feet AGL or applicable approach minimum, whichever is higher.

note.para: Flight Director Go-Around and Windshear guidance are not available with both go-around switches inoperative.
Takeoffs and Landings are not conducted in known or forecasted windshear conditions.
Thrust levers must be manually operated for Go-Around.

numlitem.para: Takeoffs and Landings in known or forecasted windshear conditions are prohibited.

placard.para: Placard G/A switches "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
